task_data.title: Add last updated timestamp to all dashboard cards and charts. Display human-readable date/time (e.g., '2 minutes ago', 'Last updated: 12:15 PM') on each card and chart. Update dashboard/public/dashboard-v2.js and dashboard/server/index.js to include timestamps in API responses and render them in the UI.
